text: Hello I'm new to HubSpot, is there any other way to setup serverless functions inside the web portal, not with CLI
yeah this should be possible. are you running into any issues?
you can create serverless functions in the Design Manager UI
can you send me screenshots of how it looks like we might not have that in out portal
new question, how to retrieve query params inside serverless functions js
Should be covered by `params` parameter in the context passed to the function <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/features/serverless-functions/reference#context-object-keys>
if you right click on a directory in the design manager, you should see "New Function" in the options menu
